LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_genitalia_resizing_ag: At this age (in biological years) any resizing gene will be applied. This is done to prevent changes and issues related to genitalia changing in the pawns growth, but also for 'ethics'.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_sexdemon_spawn_explan: If enabled, incubi and succubi can spawn in through an event.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_sexdemon_size_matters: Incubi and succubi will consider size/tightness of partners genital for deciding if they want to join
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_sexdemon_group_spawn_: Multiple sexdemons can spawn during a event
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_sexdemon_succubi_spaw: Allow Succubi to spawn through this event
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_sexdemon_incubi_spawn: Allow Incubi to spawn through this event
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_regret_stealing_love_: If off, pawns will not get bad thoughts for seduction.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_animal_mating_needs_p: If on, only animals that 'can rape' will be engaging in bestiality after being hit by a animal mating pulse. This usually means that only male animals will start breeding.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_genetic_disease_sprea: If checked, certain Genes will spread on sex.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_genetic_disease_as_endogenes_e: If checked, genetic diseases will be added as Endogenes. Otherwise they are added as Xenogenes.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_genetic_disease_spread_only_on: If checked, genetic STDs are only spread on penetrative sex. Otherwise, any sextype is considered for spread.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_generous_donor_cheatm: When enabled, pawns with the 'generous donor' are not drained and not fertilin exhausted. Hence they can fuel succubi and incubi non-stop. This makes them drastically easier to keep, and you should not do it.
LanguageData.rjw_genes_settings_detailed_debug_explan: Adds detailed information to the log about interactions and genes.
